tasks.task_description: Update app/build.gradle.kts with Firebase dependencies (Firestore, Auth, BOM)
Create Firestore data model classes (User, AppUsage, NotificationData, GamificationData, AnalyticsData)
Create FirestoreService.kt for all database operations
Update AnalyticsService.kt to sync with Firestore
Update UserEngagementAnalyzer.kt to fetch from Firestore
Update NotificationEffectivenessTracker.kt to store in Firestore
Update UserFeedbackManager.kt to store feedback in Firestore
Create FIREBASE_SETUP.md with setup instructions and security rules

description: Integrate Firebase Firestore into Brave Brain Android app with data models, service layer, and sync capabilities
context: Added Firebase BOM 32.7.0, Firestore KTX, Auth KTX, and Play Services Auth dependencies to build.gradle.kts
Created FirestoreModels.kt with data classes: UserProfile, AppUsageData, NotificationData, GamificationData, AnalyticsData, UserFeedback
Created FirebaseAuthManager.kt with anonymous and email/password authentication support
Created FirestoreService.kt with CRUD operations for all data models, offline persistence enabled, and proper error handling
Created AnalyticsFirestoreSync.kt extension class to sync analytics data with Firestore without modifying existing AnalyticsService
Created UserEngagementFirestoreSync.kt to fetch historical usage and analytics data from Firestore
Created NotificationFirestoreSync.kt to track notification effectiveness and calculate metrics in Firestore
Created FeedbackFirestoreSync.kt to submit and analyze user feedback in Firestore
Created FirestoreMigrationHelper.kt to migrate local SharedPreferences data to Firestore with status tracking
Created comprehensive FIREBASE_SETUP.md with step-by-step instructions, security rules, indexes, authentication setup, and troubleshooting guide
